loading.title: Loading resume...
loading.subtitle: Fetching data from Firebase Realtime Database

error.title: Error loading resume
error.subtitle: Could not load data from Firebase.
error.checkConfig: Please check your Firebase configuration and internet connection.

firebaseConfig.title: Firebase Configuration Missing
firebaseConfig.subtitle: The VITE_FIREBASE_CONFIG environment variable is not defined.
firebaseConfig.step1: Create a .env.local file in the project root
firebaseConfig.step2: Add your Firebase configuration as a JSON string
firebaseConfig.getConfigStep4: Copy the firebaseConfig object and stringify it

fallback.title: Person Required
fallback.description: No person was specified for this resume application. To view a resume, you need to set the VITE_PERSON environment variable.
fallback.securityNote: This application requires a person to be specified at build/start time for security and configuration purposes.
